Everything looks good, have a nive meeting
Ops! The internet looks a bit slow\n Try connecting to another network. Contact your network provider
Something it\'s not right with your WIFI!\n Move closer to the WIFI access point or move around to get a better signal.\n Switch to another hotspot

Having problems with your Skype for Business calls? An Internet connection is the most likely culprit. A poor Internet connection can cause low-quality audio and video, delays, and dropped calls.

 If you have a slow connection, the following tips might help:

 Move closer to the WiFi access point or move around to get a better signal.

 Switch to another hotspot if available.

 Disable WiFi on your device and try enabling it again.

 If your modem, or router is old, then everything will seem to be running slow even with a fast connection. It might be worth upgrading your hardware if all else fails.
